citations.narrative:
3.56(a)Sanitation. The building and cages housing the 62 rabbits is cluttered with an accumulation of animal bedding,
excreta, excess feed, cobwebs and dust. It is important to periodically clean enclosures to ensure the comfort and well-
being of the animals and to maintain their health. Buildings must be kept clean to facilitate husbandry practices.
CORRECT BY 2/01/2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n
